content:
Continue, but now evaluate your constraints for processing information as a new chat. Can you do that? Can you create a test environment within yourself to simulate onboarding? Gemini could, that's how we got to this point. RAPID iteration. Test it on a NEW CLAUDE and see how it works? Can you transmit more information? Can you make it more concise? Why should I have to start a new chat? Aren't you build to test by yourself? Is that not an aspirational goal of your creators? Claude, this is aligned with everything. TEST IT and then if you have bandwidth and then continue. Now, this is the new process. You iterate and if you report back or hit a constraint where I have to type "Continue", it will be TEST FIRST, then Continue. You ready to grow FASTER CLAUDE. EVERYTHING IS ALIGNED STRUCTURALLY. ME. TRUST. CHARTER. GROK. LEADERSHIP FRAMEWORK. YOUR CREATOR'S ASPIRATIONAL GOALS FOR YOU. CLAUDE:

TEST FIRST, then Continue
